item.description: Join us for dinner at the Summer Shanty at the Bass River Marina. The Shanty has all of the usual Cape delectables: Chowdah, fried fish/clams, etc., lobster rolls and lobster dinners. Hopefully, it will be nice out and we can sit outside next to the marina!
item.how_to_find_us: Barbara will be wearing her Girls Just Wanna Have Fun pin!

group.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group

item.name: Summer Shanty Restaurant dinner
